plot: A pair of French-speaking siblings meet to talk about the details of their mother's estate while they struggle to cope with her recent disappearance.
title: Potage de ma mère
plot_es: A pair of French-speaking siblings meet to talk about the details of their mother's estate while they struggle to cope with her recent disappearance.
plot_en: A pair of French-speaking siblings meet to talk about the details of their mother's estate while they struggle to cope with her recent disappearance.
